description:
Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum to defend himself and protect Robin and Rebecca!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Escape! Luffy`s Tide-Turning Elephant Gun!
Daidasshutsu! Luffy Kishikaisei no Elephant Gun
Une grande évasion ! L`Eléphant Gun de Luffy qui fait tourner la roue
Великий побег. Слонобой Луффи пробивает путь наружу
هروب عظيم! مسدّس فيل لوفي الّذي يقلب الموازين!
大脱出! ルフィ起死回生の象銃[エレファントガン]
